title: Deiveson Figueiredo def. Tim Elliott at UFC on ESPN+ 19: Best photos
text:
Check out the best photos from Deiveson Figueiredo’s submission win over Tim Elliott at UFC on ESPN+ 19 at Amalie Arena in Tampa, Fla. (Photos by Reinhold Matay, USA TODAY Sports)

Oct 12, 2019; Tampa, FL, USA; Deiveson Figueiredo (red gloves) fights Tim Elliott (not pictured) during… Oct 12, 2019; Tampa, FL, USA; Deiveson Figueiredo (red gloves) fights Tim Elliott (not pictured) during UFC Fight Night at Amalie Arena. Mandatory Credit: Reinhold Matay-USA TODAY Sports more
